title: Dr. Mundo is just completely broken.... why?
body: OK so how the hell is Dr. Mundo fair? at the end of a game he can walk away from combat for like five seconds and be at full hp, there is being a tank and then there is being effectively invulnerable ind any one v one situation and nearly un-killable even with the entire team pounding on him. Like I have said Yi is broken but catch him off guard you can kill him, Dr. Mundo.... just soaks up damage like a sponge then heal whatever he takes in seconds HOW IS THIS FAIR?

I love how during the recent live patch feed riot did, they talked about going through old champions and reworking/modifying their kits to fit what league is today but they completely ignored the handful of champions that are original champions that have virtually never been touched with a buff/nerf/rework yet still, to this day, have higher ban rates than 90% of all the champions in the game. These champs, especially Trynd, Mundo,  and also Garen, are game breaking champs. They are inevitable, no matter what you do, short of not fighting at all, they are guaranteed to become almost unkillable and will almost single handedly win the game by themselves. That is something that should not ever be a thing in a game that is based off of earning your gold and therefore strength. Earning. Not having your strength waiting there for you at the ready.

I was actually just talking about this with one of my friends. Riot has been so afraid of nerfing champs into the void, that instead of actually nerfing them, they have started to change the game around their broken nature to compensate for it. It all started with the release of Kayn, a champ that broke ganking and almost made a fundamental part of winning games useless, the ability to ward and always know when there are enemies coming in to your lane, Kayn bypassed that, he can come in completely undetected. So instead of fixing their mistake, riot started adapting the game around this, Talons slight rework was next, now there is a champion that has the capability of countering this gamebreaking ability. But that didn’t fix the issue of damage balancing between two separate endgame forms, darkin still being the most broken jungle in the game, the lifesteal, the mobility, the ultimate and healing gained from that. So they brought in Aatrox’s rework and hoped that that would even it out, and it didn’t, and now we come to the new bounty system, a system that makes having a significant lead mid game, hard earned, and hard fought for, completely and utterly useless because the enemy team decides to focus you in a heavily one sided team fight and even though you are the only one that died, their hardcarry just got 1300 gold, then bam, lead gone.

Oh and I almost forgot, this constant fear of overnerfing champs lead to broken abilities and kits running rampant so they had to compensate with other popular champs and boost items and lifesteal, and now here we are, where there are at least 5 champs in every lane that can absolutely destroy you without barely lifting a finger at level 3. Mundo has consistently been far stronger in higher elo than low
He even had a short stint of being pick/ban in competitive.

Also on Mundo's team [that match](https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2969432746/241431818?tab=overview) was a {{champion:31}} {{item:3800}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3031}} with more kills, damage dealt, and healing done compared to the Mundo (with a slight edge in damage taken for Mundo). Why isn't this thread about that? Cho with IE and no crit chance must be strong.

You were the only one on your team with Grievous Wounds (kudos to you for that) except Zyra's Ignite, and his ult is balanced around being affected by GW, so whenever you weren't dealing magic damage to him, it was overpowered. If one of your team's marksmen had had {{item:3033}} it might've helped.

Mundo is barely viable.

That is the uncomfortable truth of this situation.

All that said, however... yes, Mundo is absolutely awful to deal with and needs a rework, and he is my preferred ban when playing draft modes. His ult regen used to be strong normally and garbage when under GW, and then it was buffed to be strong when under GW and ridiculously OP otherwise. It forces opponents into a certain build path lest they face an unkillable menace, and it's simply a poor design that did not merit such a buff and should've stayed in the dumpster along with cleaver spam.
